title: Admiral James Stavridis (Ret) Commends President Trump For Keeping a Residual Military Force In Afghanistan
text:
Admiral James Stavridis (Ret), former Supreme Allied Commander at NATO and currently a member of the Carlyle Group, spoke with Brian Kilmeade about President Trump saying he will keep 8,600 troops in Afghanistan, General Mattis not taking gratuitous shots at President Trump after resigning as Secretary of Defense and Iran leadership potentially having talks with President Trump . Plus, Admiral Stavridis on his fear that the outcome of the China, Hong Kong standoff will end badly and why we need to keep troops in Turkey in order to prevent the resurgence of the Islamic State.

Listen here:
